original_text: And you shall do the same with his donkey or with his garment, or with any lost thing of your brother's, which he loses and you find; you may not ignore it.
korean_text: 나귀라도 그리하고 의복이라도 그리하고 형제가 잃어버린 어떤 것이든지 네가 얻거든 다 그리하고 못 본 체하지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: And you shall do the same
or with any lost thing of your brother's
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 네 형제의 잃어버린 어떤 것에 대해서도

sentences.original_text: which he loses and you find
